meanings.sent1: The gloater smiled widely after winning the game.
meanings.sent2: The gloater was happy about his victory.
meanings.sent3: The gloater's grin showed his joy in winning.

meanings.sent5: The gloater's face beamed with pride.

meanings.definition: To look at or think about with great satisfaction or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: She would gloater over her beautiful garden every morning.
meanings.sent2: He liked to gloater at the stunning view from the hilltop.
meanings.sent3: The child would gloater at the colorful butterflies in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The artist would gloater at his masterpiece for hours.
meanings.sent5: The chef would gloater at the delicious meal he had prepared.

meanings.definition: To brag or boast about one's own success or good fortune.
meanings.sent1: He would gloater about his promotion to all his friends.
meanings.sent2: She loved to gloater about her new car to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The student would gloater about getting the highest score in the class.
meanings.sent4: The actor would gloater about his award-winning performance.
meanings.sent5: The singer would gloater about her sold-out concert.
